mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nutrient ( nutrient_id, food_img, name, weight, cal, carbo, sugars, fat, protein, calcium, phosphorus, sodium, potassium, magnesium, iron, zinc, cholesterol, transfat) VALUES (FOODS_SEQ.nextVal, #{food_img}, #{name}, #{weight}, #{cal}, #{carbo}, #{sugars}, #{fat}, #{protein}, #{calcium}, #{phosphorus}, #{sodium}, #{potassium}, #{magnesium}, #{iron}, #{zinc}, #{cholesterol}, #{transfat});
